Posts.Content: On 8/10/2008 julie8 wrote: Thanks for your comment. I am going to ask my oncologist on the 19th of this month - I just feel like such a complainer - but I hate hurting all the time.   On 8/9/2008 Addiebelle wrote: I am having the same feelings about the arimidex.I have been on it for 2 yrs.and am having bone pain, swelling, and weight gain,plus feeling tired and sleepy most of the time. I too,wonder if the bone damage can be reversed. I am going to ask my oncologist about it at my next appoiniment.I had osteoporsis when I started taking it. AddiebelleMy mother has been on a variety of treatments including arimidex.  She tonight told me she just can't take the joint pain from them anymore.  She is starting back on Tamoxafin tomorrow.  I am of course so worried for her for a number of reasons.  I was wondering if anyone has tried hypnosis or acupuncture.  While my mom was having chemo, she went to regular sessions of acupuncture, and always said she couldn't have gone through chemo without it.  I hope someone out there has some insight that I can pass on to my mother.  Thanks.
Posts.Title: Arimidex - side effects
